title: My account got hacked ;-;
body: Im so sad right now. I was only level 28 and i really wanted to get to level 30 and BAM SOMEONE HACKS MY ACCOUNT. My summoner name was Miss Eccentric. ;-; Im actually so sad because i actually spent money on skins. The person changed the email and everything... Rito hasnt replied to my ticket yet.... {{item:3151}} Anyone experienced the same thing?{{champion:32}}

replies.body:
Read [this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694). It has all the official instructions on what you should do if you lose access to your account because it was hacked/you just forget everything about it. You'll probably need some sort of proof that it was actually your account. And the quicker you make your initial ticket, the more likely that it'll be saved without a scratch.

You'll also want to read [this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) to avoid it from happening again in the future.

Best of luck.

My acount also got hacked but it wasnt that bad he just refunded some of my skins and gave himself some mystery skins. I know it wasnt as bad as it was for you but it doesnt feel good to know that soemone can get in on your acount so easy. Just keep on posting and eventually someone from Riot will se it and i hope you get your acount back
